name: Chattertots Speech and Language Therapy
description: Chattertots is run by Louise Hibbert, a fully qualified Speech and Language Therapist who specialises in working with children aged approximately 2 to 8 years.  Based in Godalming, we cover Witley, Chiddingfold, Haslemere, Hindhead, Elstead, Farnham, Ash, Worplesdon, Guildford, Shalford, Chilworth, Shere, Cranleigh and surrounding areas in West Surrey and parts of North-East Hampshire. We provide private therapy at home-based clinics, schools, and your home
